1 namespace Fasetto.Word
2 {
3  using Fasetto.Word.Core;
4  using System.Windows;
5  using System.Windows.Input;
6 
7  /// <summary>
8  /// The View model for the windowHandle
9  /// </summary>
10  internal class WindowViewModel : BaseViewModel
11  {
12  #region private members
13 
14  /// <summary>
15  /// The margin around the windowHandle to allow for a drop shadow
16  /// </summary>
17  private int mOuterMarginSize = 10;
18 
19  /// <summary>
20  /// The last known dock position
21  /// </summary>
22  private WindowDockPosition mWindowDockPosition = WindowDockPosition.Undocked;
23 
24  /// <summary>
25  /// The windows this ViewModel controls
26  /// </summary>
27  private Window mWindowHandle;
28 
29  /// <summary>
30  /// the radius of the edge around the windowHandle
31  /// </summary>
32  private int windowRadius = 10;
33 
34  #endregion private members
35 
36  #region Constructor
37 
38  /// <summary>
39  /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="WindowViewModel"/> class.
40  /// </summary>
41  /// <param name="windowHandle">The windowHandle.</param>
42  public WindowViewModel(Window windowHandle)
43  {
44  mWindowHandle = windowHandle;
45 
46  // Listen for Window Resize event
47  mWindowHandle.StateChanged += (sender, e) =>
48  {
49  // Fire of events on resizing of windowHandle
50  OnPropertyChanged(nameof(ResizeBorderThickness));
51  OnPropertyChanged(nameof(OuterMarginSize));
52  OnPropertyChanged(nameof(OuterMarginSizeThickness));
53  OnPropertyChanged(nameof(WindowRadius));
54  OnPropertyChanged(nameof(WindowCornerRadius));
55  };
56 
57  // Create commands
58  MinimizeCommand = new RelayCommand(() => mWindowHandle.WindowState = WindowState.Minimized);
59  MaximizeCommand = new RelayCommand(() => mWindowHandle.WindowState ^= WindowState.Maximized);
60  CloseCommand = new RelayCommand(() => mWindowHandle.Close());
61  SystemMenuCommand = new RelayCommand(() => SystemCommands.ShowSystemMenu(mWindowHandle, GetMousePosition(mWindowHandle)));
62 
63  // Fix windowHandle resize issue when windowHandle.style is none
64  var resizer = new WindowResizer(mWindowHandle);
65  }
66 
67  #endregion Constructor
68 
69  #region Commands
70 
71  /// <summary>
72  /// Gets or sets the command to close the windowHandle
73  /// </summary>
74  public ICommand CloseCommand { get; set; }
75 
76  /// <summary>
77  /// Gets or sets the command to maximize the windowHandle
78  /// </summary>
79  public ICommand MaximizeCommand { get; set; }
80 
81  /// <summary>
82  /// Gets or sets the command to minimize the windowHandle
83  /// </summary>
84  public ICommand MinimizeCommand { get; set; }
85 
86  /// <summary>
87  /// Gets or sets the command to show the System Menu
88  /// </summary>
89  public ICommand SystemMenuCommand { get; set; }
90 
91  #endregion Commands
92 
93 
94 
95  #region Public Properties
96 
97  /// <summary>
98  /// Gets or sets true if the windowHandle should be borderless because its docked/maximized
99  /// </summary>
100  public bool Borderless => mWindowHandle.WindowState == WindowState.Maximized || mWindowDockPosition != WindowDockPosition.Undocked;
101 
102  /// <summary>
103  /// Gets or sets the padding of the main windowHandle content
104  /// </summary>
105  public Thickness InnerContentPadding { get; set; } = new Thickness(0);
106 
107  /// <summary>
108  /// Gets or sets the margin around the windowHandle to allow for a drop shadow
109  /// </summary>
110  public int OuterMarginSize
111  {
112  get => Borderless ? 0 : mOuterMarginSize;
113  set => mOuterMarginSize = value;
114  }
115 
116  /// <summary>
117  /// Gets or sets the thickness of the OuterMargin
118  /// </summary>
119  public Thickness OuterMarginSizeThickness => new Thickness(OuterMarginSize);
120 
121  /// <summary>
122  /// The size of the resize border around the windowHandle
123  /// </summary>
124  public int ResizeBorder => Borderless ? 0 : 6;
125 
126  /// <summary>
127  /// Gets or sets the size of the resize border around the windowHandle, taking into account
128  /// the outer margin
129  /// </summary>
130  public Thickness ResizeBorderThickness => new Thickness(ResizeBorder + OuterMarginSize);
131 
132  /// <summary>
133  /// Gets or sets the height of the title bar
134  /// </summary>
135  public int TitleHeight { get; set; } = 36;
136 
137  /// <summary>
138  /// Gets or sets the title bar height as grid length
139  /// </summary>
140  public GridLength TitleHeightGridLength => new GridLength(TitleHeight + ResizeBorder);
141 
142  /// <summary>
143  /// Gets or sets the Radius of the corner edge of the windowHandle
144  /// </summary>
145  public CornerRadius WindowCornerRadius => new CornerRadius(WindowRadius);
146 
147  /// <summary>
148  /// Gets or sets the minimum height the windowHandle can be
149  /// </summary>
150  public int WindowMinimumHeight { get; set; } = 500;
151 
152  /// <summary>
153  /// Gets or sets the minimum width the windowHandle can be
154  /// </summary>
155  public int WindowMinimumWidth { get; set; } = 800;
156 
157  /// <summary>
158  /// Gets or sets the radius of the edge around the windowHandle
159  /// </summary>
160  public int WindowRadius
161  {
162  get => Borderless ? 0 : windowRadius;
163  set => windowRadius = value;
164  }
165 
166  #endregion Public Properties
167 
168  #region Private helper functions
169 
170  /// <summary>
171  /// Gets the current mouse position on the screen
172  /// </summary>
173  /// <param name="window">The window handle</param>
174  /// <returns>Returns a mouse position as a <see cref="System.Windows.Point"/></returns>
175  private System.Windows.Point GetMousePosition(Window window)
176  {
177  var position = Mouse.GetPosition(window);
178  return new System.Windows.Point(position.X + window.Left, position.Y + window.Top);
179  }
180 
181  #endregion Private helper functions
182  }
183 }
